title: West Ham v Newcastle: Premier League – live

title: Cambridgeshire train stabbing: suspects both British and ‘nothing to suggest’ attack was terrorism, say police – latest updates
summary: Two men have been arrested for attempted murder following an incident that left two individuals in life-threatening condition. The authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding the event. No further details about the victims or the incident have been released yet.
